title: is it possible to add dependency on -lm [or equivalent] in spack package dependencies?
body:
Some compilers do not link with -lm [or equivalent] by default. And some packaged do not deal with this in their build tools.

Does spack provide a mechanism to specify a dependency on -lm or equivalent library?

[for eg: gcc on fedora 27 requires -lm. And one should not use -lm with intel compilers - as intel provides -limf - which intel compilers link with by default]

The issue arises with 'plasma' package.
